original_text:
So the people of Benjamin saw that they were defeated.
The men of Israel gave ground to Benjamin, because they trusted the men in ambush whom they had set against Gibeah.
korean_text: 이에 베냐민 자손이 자기가 패한 것을 깨달았으니 이는 이스라엘 사람이 기브아에 매복한 군사를 믿고 잠깐 베냐민 사람 앞을 피하매

sentences.original_text: So the people of Benjamin saw
The men of Israel gave ground to Benjamin
because they trusted the men in ambush
whom they had set against Gibeah
